title: Evostar: Legendary Warrior RPG
summary: Fight & Defeat legendary Dragon Warriors and become a god in a Multiplayer RPG.
description: Download now and join thousands of legendary Dragon Warriors in a quest to rule the the galaxy in an anime RPG. Long ago the legendary dragon god Skubata had created the universe. With his divine powers he created 4 Dragon Warrior races to roam the galaxy.Each Dragon Warrior race was given the superpowers of: Strength, Speed, Martial Arts and powerful KI ball blasts. The god is looking for a great Dragon Warrior to join him in the heavens to rule the universe. Only one can reach the top, Will it be you?Player  ★★★★★  reviews: 5/5 "Loving it hands down the most addictive platformer on this side of the galaxy!"5/5 "Great!!! Im really hooked with this game.."5/5 “Very cool sci fi role playing game, love my heroic anime warrior” *NEW - Recently added multiplayer feature: easily invite your friends to a heroic cross-galaxy space battle    Follow us on social networks!We are dedicated to making Evostar: Legendary Warriors RPG the best Action RPG on mobile! New content will be added regularly.Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/evostarlegendarywarriorsTwitter: https://twitter.com/EvostarRpgFEATURES✔ Travel, fight and defeat enemies across the galaxy!✔ Beat each level in each planet and become the greatest heroic space warrior!✔ Handle various exciting higher gravity levels as you get stronger!✔ Inflict massive damage on your enemies and dodge or deflect their attacks!✔ Craft legendary Power Suits!✔ Slay your enemies in fast paced fights full of action!✔ Power up your anime warrior and upgrade his attributes to legendary levels!✔ Collect lots of exciting loot after every fight!✔ Transformations - When you upgrade your attributes enough, something legendary might happen…!✔ Fight and defeat legendary enemies, and become stronger after every fight!✔ multiplayer RPG - challenge your friends to the ultimate RPG multiplayer battle✔ Awesome anime like experience might resemble the feeling of the great  anime such as naruto or dragon ball z!And that doesn't even scratch the surface:✔ A classic RPG - upgrade your attributes, craft your own various Power Suits and collect loot!✔ Never-ending number of levels to beat! ✔ Slay infinite number of enemies in legendary heroic fights across the galaxy!✔ 50 unique Power Suits you can craft!✔ Break chests and collect their loot while you slay your enemies!✔ Enjoy the exciting action by flying super-fast wherever you want!✔ Collect loot from your very own Spaceship!✔ Awesome graphics, sci fi and anime effects!✔ Cool sci fi action themed sounds and music!✔ Heroic anime themed warrios, placed in a beautiful sci fi world!✔ Fight and defeat your enemies in this new exciting sci fi free role playing game.What are you waiting for?! Join the action in Evostar: Legendary Warriors RPG and fight to become the greatest and strongest anime warrior in the galaxy!PLEASE NOTE! descriptionHTML:
Download now and join thousands of legendary Dragon Warriors in a quest to rule the the galaxy in an anime RPG.
Long ago the legendary dragon god Skubata had created the universe. With his divine powers he created 4 Dragon Warrior races to roam the galaxy.
Each Dragon Warrior race was given the superpowers of: Strength, Speed, Martial Arts and powerful KI ball blasts.
The god is looking for a great Dragon Warrior to join him in the heavens to rule the universe. Only one can reach the top, Will it be you?

Player ★★★★★ reviews:
5/5 "Loving it hands down the most addictive platformer on this side of the galaxy!"
5/5 "Great!!! Im really hooked with this game.."
5/5 “Very cool sci fi role playing game, love my heroic anime warrior”

*NEW - Recently added multiplayer feature: easily invite your friends to a heroic cross-galaxy space battle

Follow us on social networks!
We are dedicated to making Evostar: Legendary Warriors RPG the best Action RPG on mobile! New content will be added regularly.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/evostarlegendarywarriors
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EvostarRpg

FEATURES
✔ Travel, fight and defeat enemies across the galaxy!
✔ Beat each level in each planet and become the greatest heroic space warrior!
✔ Handle various exciting higher gravity levels as you get stronger!
✔ Inflict massive damage on your enemies and dodge or deflect their attacks!
✔ Craft legendary Power Suits!
✔ Slay your enemies in fast paced fights full of action!
✔ Power up your anime warrior and upgrade his attributes to legendary levels!
✔ Collect lots of exciting loot after every fight!
✔ Transformations - When you upgrade your attributes enough, something legendary might happen…!
✔ Fight and defeat legendary enemies, and become stronger after every fight!
✔ multiplayer RPG - challenge your friends to the ultimate RPG multiplayer battle
✔ Awesome anime like experience might resemble the feeling of the great anime such as naruto or dragon ball z!
And that doesn't even scratch the surface:
✔ A classic RPG - upgrade your attributes, craft your own various Power Suits and collect loot!
✔ Never-ending number of levels to beat!
✔ Slay infinite number of enemies in legendary heroic fights across the galaxy!
✔ 50 unique Power Suits you can craft!
✔ Break chests and collect their loot while you slay your enemies!
✔ Enjoy the exciting action by flying super-fast wherever you want!
✔ Collect loot from your very own Spaceship!
✔ Awesome graphics, sci fi and anime effects!
✔ Cool sci fi action themed sounds and music!
✔ Heroic anime themed warrios, placed in a beautiful sci fi world!
✔ Fight and defeat your enemies in this new exciting sci fi free role playing game.

What are you waiting for?!
Join the action in Evostar: Legendary Warriors RPG and fight to become the greatest and strongest anime warrior in the galaxy!

PLEASE NOTE! Evostar: Legendary Warrior RPG is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this option, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Moreover, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Evostar: Legendary Warrior RPG.

Support
Are you having problems? Feel free to contact us at info@spartonix.com, we'll be glad to help!

Terms of Service: http://www.spartonix.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.spartonix.com/privacy-policy/
comments: Team battles I love the game but you guys should also add coop missions too that would be cool and more with the pvp like 2v2 3v3 4v4 and so on and fun events like multiplayver boss battles on the dailey and arena rewards and the rewards to be an amount of crystals and the top 10 get like $10 worth to $50 worth

Loved the game, played for several hours and when I went to log back in, I'd lost all the progress I had made.. seems like other people are having this issue and nothing is being done. So 1 star until the developer starts showing they care.

Would give it a better rating but... Every time I try to play the first level on the second planet it just closes out of the app. I've restarted my phone and reinstalled the app like 9 TIMES and it still won't work. Please fix thank you.

Lost data I was getting into it until it deleted my data and stats after less than one freaking day of playing. Srsly if there's nothing I can do about this then someone needs to get their crap together please bc this seems like a fun game. I already some money to get started too.

Crashes The game keeps crashing randomly every few minutes and its freaking annoying.  Please fix the random crash bug. Apart from that it's an excellent game.  If you fix the crash bug I'll rate it 5 stars
Saved Game Constantly Lost Alright game except the annoying reset that keeps happening. Had to redo planet 2 like 8 times before finally able to move onto 3rd
recentChanges: Thank you for your great support!
* MULTIPLAYER!!! - Fight random matches or your friends warriors!
What are you waiting for? Download now!
If you're having fun, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter!
